summary: Email from attorney Sigrid McCawley transmitting discovery documents in a case involving defendant Ghislaine Maxwell, including interrogatories, requests for admission, and requests for production. The email indicates ongoing litigation and discovery efforts, with plans to provide access to videos.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.context: Attorney at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP sending discovery documents related to a case involving defendant Maxwell; indicates she is providing documents and working to provide access to videos.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: Referred to as the defendant in the litigation; multiple discovery documents are directed to or from her, including interrogatories and requests for production.

connections.description: McCawley is transmitting discovery documents related to Maxwell's case, indicating she is part of the legal team representing or involved in litigation concerning Maxwell.

events.title: Plaintiffs' First Set of Interrogatories to Maxwell
events.description: Plaintiffs served their first set of interrogatories to defendant Maxwell.

events.title: Defendant's Responses to Discovery Requests
events.description: Defendant filed responses to plaintiffs' first set of requests for admissions and interrogatories.

events.title: Plaintiffs' First Set of Requests for Production to Maxwell
events.description: Plaintiffs served their first set of requests for production of documents to defendant Maxwell.

events.title: Defendant's Responses to First Requests for Production
events.description: Defendant filed responses and objections to plaintiffs' first requests for production.

events.title: Plaintiffs' Second Set of Requests for Production to Maxwell
events.description: Plaintiffs served a second set of requests for production to defendant Maxwell.

events.title: Defendant's Responses to Second Requests for Production
events.description: Defendant filed responses and objections to plaintiffs' second requests for production.

locations: 401 E. Las Olas Blvd. Suite 1200, Fort Lauderdale, FL
keyFacts: Attorney Sigrid McCawley of Boies Schiller Flexner LLP is involved in transmitting discovery documents related to litigation against Ghislaine Maxwell.
Multiple discovery documents from 2015-2016 are referenced, indicating ongoing civil litigation involving Maxwell as a defendant.
The email mentions plans to provide access to videos, suggesting visual evidence may be part of the discovery in the case.
The correspondence is marked as confidential and subject to attorney-client privilege, indicating sensitive legal communications.
